Article.ArticleTitle: Scientific highlights of the 9th ESWI Influenza Conference.

Abstract.AbstractText: The European Scientific Working Group on Influenza (ESWI) held the 9th ESWI Influenza Conference in Valencia from 17-20 September 2023. Here we provide a summary of twelve key presentations, covering major topics on influenza virus, respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) and SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) including: infection processes beyond acute respiratory disease, long COVID, vaccines against influenza and RSV, the implications of the potential extinction of influenza B virus Yamagata lineage, and the threats posed by zoonotic highly pathogenic avian influenza viruses.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Pikado BV, Utrechtse Heuvelrug, the Netherlands.
Department of Medical Microbiology and Infection Prevention, Amsterdam University Medical Center, Amsterdam, The Netherlands.
Center of Infection Medicine and Zoonosis Research and the University of Veterinary Medicine Hannover, Hannover, Germany. Albert.Osterhaus@tiho-hannover.de.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Ab Osterhaus is the Editor-in-Chief of One Health Outlook.
